Write-Up Text: The buzz on social media is all about the upcoming Australian budget with people sharing stories and opinions from all walks of life. Homelessness advocates are pushing for greater funding while others are raising alarm about the increasing national debt. The issue of scam text messages is also under the spotlight with the government announcing plans to combat the problem while a proposal for an SMS sender ID registry has gained traction. Meanwhile the Australian Defence Force is undergoing significant changes following a strategic review.
